titleStmt.title: A case of conscience resolved: concerning ministers medling with state matters in their sermons: and how far they are obliged by the Covenant to interpose in the affairs of civil government. / By J.D. Minister of the Gospell. March 15, imprimatur, Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
